GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v6.0.10
GSD.description:
Input: i8042 - fix leaking of platform device on module removal

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit a32cd7feb0127bf629a82686b6e2c128139a86e5, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 9222ba68c3f4065f6364b99cc641b6b019ef2d42. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: Input: i8042 - fix leaking of platform device on module removal
